channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
[code].\Javas\client.java:6367: array required, but java.lang.String found clan[Integer.parseInt(token3[0]) ] = Long ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
The string im trying to call on in char file is String clan = ""
here is the code [code] if (token.equals("character-clan")) { clan[Integer.parseInt(token3[0])] = Long .parseLong(token3[1]); } break;[/code]

item.title: Help!

item.description:

here is the code
